2015-0558 (La. 5/2/16).

STATE EX REL. Brandon LAVERGNE v. STATE of Louisiana NO. 2015-KH-0558 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 2, 2016

Applying for Reconsideration of this Court’s action dated March 14, 2016; Par*876ish of Evangeline, 13th Judicial District Court, Section A, No. 58521; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. CW 14-01036;

| ¶ Reconsideration denied.
